dictionary.ListError: An unexpected error occurred, when loading a page of the list.
dictionary.PermissionError: An unexpected error occurred when setting permission.
dictionary.DeleteRoleError: An unexpected error occurred when deleting the group.
dictionary.CreateRoleError: An unexpected error occurred when creating the group.
dictionary.RemoveUserFromRoleError: An unexpected error occurred when removing the user from the group.
dictionary.AddUserToRoleError: An unexpected error occurred when adding the user to the group.
dictionary.CreateRoleWithUserError: An unexpected error occurred when creating the group with the user.
dictionary.UserCodeIsNotEntered: The user code is not entered.
dictionary.RemoveProjectFromRoleError: An unexpected error occurred when removing the work's permission from the group.
dictionary.AddProjectToRoleError: An unexpected error occurred when adding the work's permission to the group.
dictionary.AddProjectToUserError: An unexpected error occurred when adding the work's permission to the user.
dictionary.PasswordResetSuccess: Link for resetting password was sent to the user's email.
dictionary.DeleteRoleConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete group {0}?
dictionary.RegisteredRoleModifyWarning: The group {0} is automatically assigned to every registered user. Are you sure that you wanted to modify it?
dictionary.UnregisteredRoleModifyWarning: The group {0} has every user who is not signed in. Are you sure that you wanted to modify it?
dictionary.RemoveUserFromRegisteredRole: The {0} is a base group for every registered user. Are you sure that you wanted to remove the user from this group?
